answers.answer: It varies. If you do have it and take care of it by eating right and checking your blood sugar levels then it should go away after you give birth. However if you dont you can end up with diabetes for the rest of your life like my moms best friend. You little one should be fine if you take care if it. If you do have it your doctor will give you lots of information on how to stay healthy. Try not to stress.

question: So in 4 weeks I am suppose to go for my glucose test....does anyone know the chances of having gd....I don't have any diabetics in my family so does that mean I'll  likely be fine? And what does it really mean if I have it? And if I do have it will I have it for life or will my son be more likely to be diabetic? I may sound dumb with all this but I'm really curious and worried.
title: glucose testing soon please help
